How to Use: - Ensure the area to be shaved is clean and wet before you start. - Hold the razor by the handle, tilt the blade towards your skin and begin shaving in the direction of hair growth. - Allow the gel bars to build up a light lather. There's no need to press hard, let the razor glide gently across your skin. - Make sure to rinse the bevel blades thoroughly after each stroke to maintain optimal blade performance. - Dry your skin and apply your favorite moisturizer to keep the skin hydrated after the shave. Storage Instructions: - Rindef the razor thoroughly after each use to remove all hair and shaving gel. - Shake off any excess water and store the razor in an upright position in a dry area to facilitate adequate air flow for swift drying. - Always replace the blade protective cap to prevent any accidental injuries or damages to the blades. - Avoid storing the razor near any heat source or in direct sunlight to preserve the integrity of the gel bars. Materials: - Handle: The handle is made from high-quality plastic with rubber inserts for a secure grip. - Blades: Stainless steel blades remain sharp for multiple uses. - Gel Bars: The gel bars are infused with body butter and a refreshing white tea scent, providing a luxurious lather.

Besides the traditional enriching as well as hydrating lubrication strip, the razor's handle is ergonomic, containing a Soft Elastomer Grip®. Wherever you choose to shave, shape, trim or style, Venus products are designed with your body and its hair in mind. Explore Venus collection of women's disposable razors designed with your body and its hair in mind. Build your shaving routine with Venus. The disposable razors accompany you wherever you are and ensure smooth, hair-free skin in a short time. Benefits: • Easy glide moisture rich strip helps razor glide over skin for a comfortable shave • Skin protective Microfins help reduce nicks and cuts • Specially designed handle lets to maneuver easily around hard-to-shave spots like ankles and knees • Reduces risk of razor burn and bumps • Contours every corner of the body effortlessly to give a close shave • Razor blades individually adjusts to hug your natural curve How To Use: • First, soak hair in the shower or bath for 2-3 minutes to soften. Lather up with a protective shave gel. Shave gel helps keep water in the hair and makes sure that the razor glides easily over your skin, protecting you from potential nicks and cuts. Plus, it helps you keep track of where you've shaved to avoid missing any spots. • Start shaving with the help of your razor. Always use a light touch, don't press down, and shave legs from the ankles up. For your underarms, shave from all angles-up, down and sideways. And for the bikini area, shave in the direction of hair growth first (inward) and against for an extra-close shave. • After shaving, moisturize. This step is very important as moisturization helps to keep your skin hydrated, not to mention glowing. • Shave as often as you need to. It's about what feels right for you and makes you feel confident and beautiful.
